title: Chinese Herbal Formulas: How We Customize Care
excerpt: Learn how personalized herbal formulas are built to match your symptoms, constitution, and goals.
author: Dr. Huang
contentMarkdown:
Personalized herbal formulas are a cornerstone of Traditional Chinese Medicine. Rather than using a single herb, we combine multiple herbs that work together to balance the body.

## How a Formula Is Built

- We start with a TCM diagnosis (pattern identification).
- A core formula is selected to address the primary pattern.
- Supporting herbs are added for secondary symptoms.
- The formula is adjusted as your condition changes.
